full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 753 Filed 08/10/22 Page 91 of 264 1517 LC7VMAX3 Carolyn - direct of the third party and the witness. (Government's Exhibit 20 received in evidence) MS. COMEY: Your Honor, may we have the jurors please turn to this exhibit in their binders. THE COURT: They may. Please take out your binders. GX-20. MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. I think the jurors can put the binders back down. THE COURT: Okay. Please do so, jury. BY MS. COMEY: Q. Carolyn, when you first met Shawn, how old did you tell him you were? A. Seventeen. Q. How, if at all, to your knowledge, did Shawn learn how old you actually were? A. I was going -- I had a birthday and I was going to be 14. Q. Did he come to your 14th birthday party? A. Yeah. Q. And is that how he learned your actual age? A. Yeah. THE COURT: I just ask again, Carolyn, please speak directly into the mic so everyone can hear you. Thank you. Q. How did Shawn lead you to meeting Jeffrey Epstein? A. Through friends of his, Virginia Roberts and Tony Figueroa. Q. How did you meet Virginia? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013104
